新东西:
-腐蚀草  (Grass that goes over to Grass and Dirt and makes wood and stone to ebonstone | Harder to destroy compared to normal Grass)
-ebonstone        (比Obsidian还硬两倍 | goes over to the same blocks as Grass)
-Vile 蘑菇   (Used to craft Purple dye | No other use currently | (very rare))
-腐蚀之刺 (Makes 1 heart dmg on collision | Grows on corruptionGrass | drops corruption seeds)
-紫色草     (Drops corruption seeds | Grows on corruption Grass)
-恶魔矿石         (is created when any ore corrupts | can be burned to demoningot | requires diamondpickaxe to drop)
-恶魔矿条       (can be used to craft the best Tools (armor and swords will follow in further versions))
-恶魔工具       (twice as good as gold + diamond tools | makes ebonstone drop)
-腐蚀生成器(creates a corruption when clicked | can be build with a bug)
-腐蚀之种  (makes purple Grass grow on Farmland?!? | will be changed)

以及没有提到的，修改了死亡的信息……
